Title: Ice Age
Overview: With the impending ice age almost upon them, a mismatched trio of prehistoric critters – Manny the woolly mammoth, Diego the saber-toothed tiger and Sid the giant sloth – find an orphaned infant and decide to return it to its human parents. Along the way, the unlikely allies become friends but, when enemies attack, their quest takes on far nobler aims.
Tagline: They came. They thawed. They conquered.
Keywords: human evolution, parents kids relationship, squirrel, ice, loss of child, mammoth, sloth, dying and death, stone age, prehistoric, saber-toothed tiger, cavemen, prehistoric creature, prehistoric adventure, prehistoric times, prehistoric man
production_companies: Twentieth Century Fox Film Corporation, Blue Sky Studios, Twentieth Century Fox Animation
Cast: Ray Romano, John Leguizamo, Denis Leary
